name: Hours
description:
Made in 10 days for Scream Zone Jam #9

Hours is a first-person horror game. It's scary.

Be warned that this game contains jumpscares and flashing images!

Streamers, rejoice: this game also supports bordered and borderless windowed modes!

Q: I'm stuck. Help!
A: Type 'debug' in-game.

(c) 2020 Bryony Mair (BlushingBryde).
